title: Spoon
description: Oval bowl, plain, gilded and undecorated. Stem of triangular section, flatsection at bottom. Annular joint at bowl. Slipped (cut at angle) end. Stem of plain silver. Plain matte gilded oval bowl, undecorated. Stem of triangular section, with flat section at bottom. annual joining at bowl. Slipped (cut at angle) end. Stem of plain silver.
name: Spoon
